purpleculture_pinyin:
bó
variegated; heterogeneous; to refute; to contradict; to ship by barge; a barge; a lighter (ship)
пестрый; неоднородный; опровергнуть; противоречить; отгружать баржей; баржа; зажигалка (корабль)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 驳)
Pictophonetic: 爻 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
駁回 [ bó huí ]: to reject; to turn down; to overrule
駁斥 [ bó chì ]: to refute; to debunk; to deny; to denounce

    • 爻 [ yáo ] diagrams for divination
heisig_chinese_memo: Wolverine had charges placed on him for murdering a horse, but he refutes stating that he couldn't have been in two different places at the same time (i.e. There cannot exist two Wolverines). He was having dinner with his Aunt Margaret at the time, it's impossible.
Ru_trainchinese:
bó: (графема) (книжн.) разноцветный, пестрый
bó: (сущ/глаг) баржа; перевозить на барже; (книжн.) расширять, продлевать (берег, дамбу)
bó: (глаг) опровергать, оспаривать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: horses (馬) that can do divination (爻) are mixed (with those that can't)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The smart horse refuted the human's argument that horses were meant to carry sheaves for humans by citing the importance of horses in the animal kingdom.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from " horse " and " yao " also sounds. " Yao " is not only a sound symbol, but also a cross-mixing meaning. The original meaning is a horse with mixed and impure fur. "Shuowen": "Refuse, the color of the horse is impure. From the horse, the sound of the line." Duan Yucai's note: "Xu Yima's different colors are all fragments, and the extension is the sorrow of all colors."

According to Wang Fengyang, the horse between the two hue called " split ", "Poetry. Bin Feng. "Dongshan": "The son of the return, the emperor refutes his horse." Mao Heng Chuan: "Huang Bai said the emperor, Liu Bai said refute." "Zhuangzi. "Tian Zifang": "Riding on a horse and leaning toward the vermilion hoof." "The horse" is a horse with a classy coat. Later, " refute " refers to refuting impure things in general, and "refuting" refers to arguments that are impure. Anything that is impure, not unitary, intermingled with each other, or mistakes with each other can be called " refutation ." " Refutation " also refers to pointing out the inconsistency of the other party's speech and criticizing it during the debate, so it can mean rebuttal, refute, refute, and refute. In other words, the word " refute " is used to denote a disagreement, which means to raise an objection to right and wrong. Therefore, "rebuttal" also refers to rebuttal and rebuttal.

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the original meaning, referring to horses with impure coat colors. "Compilation" 36987: "Swipe and Refute", to the effect that Zhen Bu uses two horses with variegated hair to sacrifice for good luck (Qu Wanli).

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period means mottled. Slip 234 of "Baoshan Chu Bamboo Slips": "Bao Di (ling)" refers to tortoise shells with patterns. "Er Ya. "Shi Yu": "Five-Yue Wengui", Guo Pu's note: "A person with literary talent."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts with " horse ", and " yao " also sounds. " Yao " also expresses the meaning of cross and miscellaneous. The original meaning is that the color of horses is mixed and impure, and it is extended to impure, such as mottled and mixed, and it is extended to rebuttal and rebuttal.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「馬」，「爻」亦聲。「爻」除了是聲符外，也兼表交錯混雜之意。本義是毛色混雜不純的馬。《說文》：「駁，馬色不純。从馬，爻聲。」段玉裁注：「許意馬異色成片段者皆得曰駁，引伸之爲凡色不純之偁。」

　　根據王鳳陽的研究，兩色相間的馬稱為「駁」，《詩．豳風．東山》：「之子于歸，皇駁其馬。」毛亨傳：「黃白曰皇，騮白曰駁。」《莊子．田子方》：「乘駁馬而偏朱蹄」，「駁馬」是毛色班駁的馬。後「駁」又泛指駁雜不純的事物，「駁辭」指蕪雜不純的辯辭。凡是不純正、不單一、互相混雜、相互間錯都可以稱「駁」。「駁」又指在辯論過程中，指出對方言辭的混雜而予以批駁，故可表示辯駁、駁斥、駁正、反駁之義。換句話說，「駁」字用來表示打破一言堂，指對是非提出異議。故「駁辭」又指駁斥、駁正之辭。

　　甲骨文用作本義，指毛色不純的馬，《合集》36987：「叀并駁」，大意是貞卜用兩匹雜色毛的馬來祭祀是否吉利（屈萬里）。

　　戰國竹簡表示斑駁，《包山楚簡》簡234：「駁霝（靈）」，指有花紋的龜甲。《爾雅．釋魚》：「五曰文龜」，郭璞注：「甲有文采者。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「馬」，「爻」亦聲。「爻」兼表交叉錯雜之義，本義是馬匹的毛色混雜不純，引申為不純之意，如斑駁、駁雜，又引申為辯駁、反駁。

甲骨文從「 馬 」，「 爻 」亦聲。「 爻 」除了是聲符外，也兼表交錯混雜之意。本義是毛色混雜不純的馬。《說文》：「駁，馬色不純。从馬，爻聲。」段玉裁注：「許意馬異色成片段者皆得曰駁，引伸之爲凡色不純之偁。」 根據王鳳陽的研究，兩色相間的馬稱為「 駁 」，《詩．豳風．東山》：「之子于歸，皇駁其馬。」毛亨傳：「黃白曰皇，騮白曰駁。」《莊子．田子方》：「乘駁馬而偏朱蹄」，「駁馬」是毛色班駁的馬。後「 駁 」又泛指駁雜不純的事物，「駁辭」指蕪雜不純的辯辭。凡是不純正、不單一、互相混雜、相互間錯都可以稱「 駁 」。「 駁 」又指在辯論過程中，指出對方言辭的混雜而予以批駁，故可表示辯駁、駁斥、駁正、反駁之義。換句話說，「 駁 」字用來表示打破一言堂，指對是非提出異議。故「駁辭」又指駁斥、駁正之辭。 甲骨文用作本義，指毛色不純的馬，《合集》36987：「叀并駁」，大意是貞卜用兩匹雜色毛的馬來祭祀是否吉利（屈萬里）。 戰國竹簡表示斑駁，《包山楚簡》簡234：「駁霝（靈）」，指有花紋的龜甲。《爾雅．釋魚》：「五曰文龜」，郭璞注：「甲有文采者。」

駁字的基本解释

駁
bó
见“驳”。

駁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》北角切，入覺，幫。］
“驳1”的繁体字。亦作“駮1”。
(1)马毛色不纯。亦指毛色不纯的马。
(2)借指毛色不纯的牛。
(3)色彩错杂。
(4)混杂不精纯。
(5)辩正是非；驳斥。
(6)相异；相背。
(7)文体名。驳议。奏议之一种。
(8)文体名。驳论，一般的辩正是非的论著。
(9)指偏于一面。
(10)用船转载搬运。
(11)小船；驳船。
(12)方言。拨，掉转。参见“駁回”。
(13)方言。把岸堤向外扩展。
(14)树木名。赤李。
(15)树木名。指驳马。即梓榆。
(16)传说中能食虎豹的猛兽。
(17)用同“剥”。剥蚀。参见“駁炙”。

駁字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駁； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1435第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?北角切，音博。【玉篇】馬色不純。【爾雅·釋畜】駵白駁。【易·說卦傳】乾爲駁馬。【詩·豳風】皇駁其馬。【註】黃白曰皇，駵白曰駁。　又【爾雅·釋木】駁赤李。【疏】李之子赤者名駁。　又今俗謂龎雜爲駁，雲開曰解駁。　【正韻】同駮。互詳後駮字註。

駁字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
駁字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
barge
bó
See "Refute".
barge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" North Point Cut, Enlighten, Help. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Pie 1". Also known as "Zhang 1".
(1) The color of horse hair is impure. Also refers to horses with impure coats.
(2) Borrowed to refer to cattle with impure coat color.
(3) The color is mixed.
(4) Mixed and impure.
(5) Argument is right and wrong; refutation.
(6) Different; opposite.
(7) The name of the style. Refute. One kind of memorial.
(8) The name of the style. Refutation, the general debate is exactly the non-thesis.
(9) Refers to one side.
(10) Reprint and transport by ship.
(11) Small boat; barge.
(12) Dialects. Dial, turn around. See "Rejection".
(13) Dialects. Extend the embankment outward.
(14) The name of the tree. Chi Li.
(15) The name of the tree. Refers to the horse. Namely Ziyu.
(16) The legendary beast that can eat tigers and leopards.
(17) Use the same as "stripping". Denuded. See "Refute".
barge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　 Bare; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1435 Page 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? North Point Cut, Yinbo. [Jade articles] The horse color is not pure. 【Erya·Shu Hu】Bai Bare. 【Easy·Said Gua Chuan】Do as a counterattack. 【Poetry·Binfeng】The emperor refutes his horse. [Note] Huang Bai said emperor, Fang Bai said barge.　[Erya·Shimu] refute Chili. 【Sparse】The name of Li's son is refuted.　Nowadays, it is said that 掐Miscellaneous is a refutation, and Yunkai said to refute.　【Zheng Yun】Same as 駮. After the mutual details, the 駮 word note.
